usage_content.secondBefore: Note: If shortcuts are not available, please open the URL (
usage_content.third: You have to select a search engine first, type {key} to select it
usage_content.four: Enter the search keywords, enter to search (if than the selected keywords with # before and after the use of space, for example: other keywords # test other keywords)

placeholder.name: Please enter the name of the search engine
placeholder.key: Please enter the key of the filter

desc.key: If not filled in the default is the same as the name
desc.icon: If you don't fill it in, it will be retrieved the first time you open the site.

url.title: The filling rules are as follows:

deleteConfirm.content: Are you sure you want to delete this search engine?
